Such posts would come up every two weeks from now so stay tuned.The official coding period of Google Summer of Code is pre ...READ MORE...

item.title: git… y u do dis

item.description: So I’m new to github. And not gonna lie, I feel a little ashamed about it. To me it’s always been one of those things that only the super impressive graduate students know how to use and navigate, but it just never stuck for me. item.title: WCS.jl Package Analysis
item.dc:creator: aquatiko
item.description: Why WCS.jl package After the introduction of package FITSIO.jl for handling FITS files in Julia, another package was required to manage the World Coordinate System(WCS) transformations of a FITS object. The WCS info. is present in the header of one of the HDU(s) of a FITS file. These transformations ...READ MORE...
